page.title: 11THE BAKER.
page.content: The Baker lives near The Green.He makes Birthday cakes,he makes buns,sugar cakes,hot cross buns,And all different kinds of things.He sometimes makes wedding cakes aswell as just buns, and cakes,.The loaves of bread cost 55p.The baker used to work and live at Mark Coleys house. His busiest day of the week is Wednesday.He makes bread out of yeast and flour and dough.To rise the bread you have to put more yeast on the top of the bread.He uses over three bags of flour a day.Most of the village use him so they do not have to travel along way to get to the baker.The Bakers name is Mister Stubbs.
